answers.answer: Hi Philip, Life *****, but you are young and you and only you can beat it, look we cant do much for your parents only you can help there, try and get them to some kind of conselling for there problems, thats a good start.Your back, chest and weight problems are proberly coming from stress and anxiety, it will do that to you.Ok so far, so how do you think you have an STD if you have not had any sexual contact, or have you been playing around with the local bike, as you copuld have picked something up on your hands, if you are that worried just get to local STD clinic and get tested, its that easy, and then that would be one trouble off your back.Good Luck

As you haven't been to the doctor what makes you think you have a STD. Do you not feel that your health problems are in some way psychological because of the stress your feeling at what is a bad time for you. I am not a doctor but I would of thought with STD the clue is in the name and you can only obtain such a condition after having sex with somebody.

question: I am very deppressed, I am 15 years old, my parents are splitting up, my mum may have breast cancer, my dad has diabetes and has had a heart attack, I have an STD although i havent had sex, i am getting back problems, gaining weight and I am getting chest pains, can someone please tell me what to do please i dont know what STD it is as i havent been to the doctors because im too nervous. thank you for your time
title: deppresion
